name: Load User Preferences
description: Load user preferences from the 'user_preferences' section of rules.json.
path_to_scripting: This rule can be implemented as a script that is run during the agent's initialization. The script would read the `rules.json` file (which now resides in `repos/diy-make/memory/public/json/rules/`). It would then extract the 'user_preferences' section and load its content into the agent's active memory. This would allow the agent to tailor its behavior based on the user's preferences.
